name: Pokémon Holidays Hacks Halloween (Cursed Version)
overview: Story: It was Halloween night. Children laughing and screaming in the night, while they trick or treat. A perfect Halloween night. Or that's what I thought, until I went out to join them. All I wanted was to trick or treat and then go challenge the gym. It couldve been simple. But I just had to go snooping around where I shouldnt. I mean, what was I thinking? A 16 year old hunting ghosts? Just a silly game most would think. I thought that too until I met the ghost that killed me.... Features: Short story • 2 endings- One good, one bad • Trick or treat! • Gen 4 sprites Known Bugs: • Silph Co floors dont show right number. • Ghost in good ending doesnt turn around. • The elevator is missing its corners in the good ending.
